paper.title: Does gold or Bitcoin hedge economic policy uncertainty?
paper.abstract: Calculating the hedge and safe-haven properties of gold and Bitcoin via GARCH model and quantile regression with dummy variables. We find that: (1) Neither gold nor Bitcoin can serve as a strong hedge or safe-haven for economic policy uncertainty (EPU) at the average condition. (2) Bitcoin is more responsive to EPU shocks, while gold maintains stability with smaller hedge and safe-haven coefficients. (3) In most cases, both gold and Bitcoin can act as the weak hedge and weak safe-haven against EPU during the extreme bearish and bullish markets, which two can be considered for portfolio diversification during the normal market.

domain_result.justification: 该论文研究了黄金和比特币在经济政策不确定性下的对冲和避险属性，这直接涉及金融风险管理中的风险对冲策略。同时，论文提到这两种资产在投资组合多样化中的应用，因此也涉及投资组合管理领域。
